an8.49:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati pubbarame migaramatupasade.
an8.49:1.2: Atha kho visakha migaramata yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe….
an8.49:1.3: Ekamantam nisinnam kho visakham migaramataram bhagava etadavoca:
an8.49:2.1: “Catuhi kho, visakhe, dhammehi samannagato matugamo idhalokavijayaya patipanno hoti, ayamsa loko araddho hoti.
an8.49:2.3: Idha, visakhe, matugamo susamvihitakammanto hoti, sangahitaparijano, bhattu manapam carati, sambhatam anurakkhati.
an8.49:3.2: Idha, visakhe, matugamo ye te bhattu abbhantara kammanta—unnati va kappasati va—tattha dakkha hoti analasa tatrupayaya vimamsaya samannagata alam katum alam samvidhatum.
an8.49:3.3: Evam kho, visakhe, matugamo susamvihitakammanto hoti.
an8.49:4.2: Idha, visakhe, matugamo yo so bhattu abbhantaro antojano—dasati va pessati va kammakarati va—
an8.49:4.3: tesam katanca katato janati akatanca akatato janati, gilanakananca balabalam janati khadaniyam bhojaniyancassa paccamsena samvibhajati.
an8.49:4.4: Evam kho, visakhe, matugamo sangahitaparijano hoti.
an8.49:5.1: Kathanca, visakhe, matugamo bhattu manapam carati?
an8.49:5.2: Idha, visakhe, matugamo yam bhattu amanapasankhatam tam jivitahetupi na ajjhacarati.
an8.49:5.3: Evam kho, visakhe, matugamo bhattu manapam carati.
an8.49:6.2: Idha, visakhe, matugamo yam bhatta aharati dhanam va dhannam va rajatam va jatarupam va tam arakkhena guttiya sampadeti, tattha ca hoti adhutti atheni asondi avinasika.
an8.49:6.3: Evam kho, visakhe, matugamo sambhatam anurakkhati.
an8.49:6.4: Imehi kho, visakhe, catuhi dhammehi samannagato matugamo idhalokavijayaya patipanno hoti, ayamsa loko araddho hoti.
an8.49:7.1: Catuhi kho, visakhe, dhammehi samannagato matugamo paralokavijayaya patipanno hoti, paraloko araddho hoti.
an8.49:7.3: Idha, visakhe, matugamo saddhasampanno hoti, silasampanno hoti, cagasampanno hoti, pannasampanno hoti.
an8.49:8.2: Idha, visakhe, matugamo saddho hoti, saddahati tathagatassa bodhim:
an8.49:8.3: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
an8.49:8.4: Evam kho, visakhe, matugamo saddhasampanno hoti.
an8.49:9.2: Idha, visakhe, matugamo panatipata pativirato hoti …pe… suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti.
an8.49:9.3: Evam kho, visakhe, matugamo silasampanno hoti.
an8.49:10.2: Idha, visakhe, matugamo vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati muttacaga payatapanini vossaggarata yacayoga danasamvibhagarata.
an8.49:10.3: Evam kho, visakhe, matugamo cagasampanno hoti.
an8.49:11.3: evam kho, visakhe, matugamo pannasampanno hoti.
an8.49:12.1: Imehi kho, visakhe, catuhi dhammehi samannagato matugamo paralokavijayaya patipanno hoti, paraloko araddho hotiti.
